info.name: autohide the menu & sidebar [Fox News]
info.description:
Hides the Fox News header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.) Moves the superfluous photo to the end of the article, and moves the Print toolbox to the right. Now it resembles news again.

"FoxNews: Almost news and fit to print"
info.additionalInfo:
The fuzzy gray strips at the top, bottom, and left edges of the screen are the collapsed header, footer, and sidebar, respectively. Mouse over a strip to restore the element.

I guessed at the height of the superfluous image. If you find a larger image that obscures the text, give me the page URL and I'll provide more room.

2013-12-17 added Fox News Latino
2013-12-04 added Fox Sports
